resources.string: If you want to identify leaf diseases, click the first button. If you want to identify insect pest click the second button.
Open the camera and capture the leaf disease or insect pest. You can also open the gallery to select image. Make sure the image is clear.
After obtaining the image, crop the area of the image where the insect pest or leaf disease is located.
Check if the characteristics of the predicted insect or leaf disease match the disease or insect you captured. Click the prediction result to view information about the insect pest or leaf disease.
